result.execSummary:
All charges against Malik Mykel Davis in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Malik Mykel Davis is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Malik Mykel Davis

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.

Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a jury trial. Parties are prepared to proceed. Court passes case.
Defendant's Witness List, received and filed.
Defendant's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Final pre-trial held. Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 7/11/22 at 8:30 am in Branch 29.

Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29. This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court MODIFIES the no contact order to no VIOLENT contact with the victim.

Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Pre-trial conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Cash bail posted is to be returned to the remitter.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CSG.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Malik Mykel Davis in court.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 29 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/10/22 @ 2p
